mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category(id, name, thumb_url, parent_id, created_at) VALUES (NULL, #{name}, #{thumbUrl}, #{parentId}, NULL)
mapper.select:
WITH RECURSIVE CategoryHierarchy AS (SELECT id AS category_id, id AS top_category_id, parent_id FROM categoryAddQueryDto WHERE parent_id IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT c.id AS category_id, ch.top_category_id, c.parent_id FROM categoryAddQueryDto c INNER JOIN CategoryHierarchy ch ON c.parent_id = ch.category_id)
SELECT ch.top_category_id AS id, c.name AS name, c.thumb_url AS thumbUrl, c.parent_id AS parentId, c.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(p.id) AS postCount FROM CategoryHierarchy ch INNER JOIN category c ON c.id = ch.top_category_id LEFT JOIN post p ON p.category_id = ch.category_id GROUP BY ch.top_category_id, c.name, c.parent_id ORDER BY ch.top_category_id;
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET name = #{name}, thumb_url = #{thumbUrl}, parent_id = #{parentId}, WHERE id = #{id}
